architectural_notes: Email sending is not enabled; provide itinerary sharing via shareable links and downloadable PDFs instead of sending emails directly.
known_issues: Draft/app build intermittently fails or expires (e.g., 'draft app has expired', 'application creation unsuccessful'), requiring rebuild/retry.

existing_features.title: Update the phone number displayed in the site footer (the "Call us:" line) from "1-800-CRUISE-NOW" to "434-238-8796".

Add an interactive "Admin Training Mode" guided walkthrough for the Admin Dashboard that can be started by an admin user and steps through the main dashboard areas (Alerts tab, Bookings tab, Logos tab) with on-screen explanations and Next/Back controls.
Add a shareable-link flow for itineraries that lets a user generate a public URL for a selected itinerary, and allows anyone with that URL to view the itinerary details without signing in.
Add a “Download as PDF” option for itineraries so a user can download a PDF containing the itinerary details for the currently viewed itinerary.

Add an admin-accessible UI in the Admin Dashboard to edit and save branding settings for the public shared itinerary page, including: brand name (text), tagline/subtitle (text), contact phone number (text), logo image URL (text), and primary/accent color values (text inputs that accept CSS color strings such as hex).

Update the public Shared Itinerary page to use the stored branding settings instead of hardcoded values, including replacing the brand name text (“Next Time Vacations”), the tagline/subtitle, the contact phone number, and displaying the logo when provided.

Apply configurable primary/accent colors from branding settings to the Shared Itinerary page in a controlled way (e.g., header/title accents, icon accent colors, and key UI highlights) while maintaining readability in both light and dark mode.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add interactive Admin Training Mode (guided walkthrough) for the admin dashboard
Update the phone number in the page footer to 434-238-8796
Add itinerary sharing options: generate a shareable link and allow downloading an itinerary as a PDF
Add customization options for the look/branding of the shared itinerary public page
Add backend storage and APIs for shared itinerary page branding settings, including: a public query to fetch the current branding settings and an admin-only update method to set them.
